page.title: 10OUR SCHOOL_BROOK ACRE
page.content:
Our school is called Brook Acre and it is 13 years old.It is a modern building made of grey bricks and surrounded by 2 playgrounds and playing fields.We have got 306 children aged 5 to 11 years. They are in 10 classes,5 junior and 5 infant. The juniors are upstairs and the infants downstairs.We have got 2 computers. Some of the things we do in school are English P.E Maths Reading and Topic.After school we have teams for rugby, soccer,netball,rounders and cross country running.We have a gym club and a badminton club.We do a show each year in july.This year we did The Wizard of Oz.Vandals have broken down some trees round our school.
by Robert Stone and Julian Wilson age 10 and 9.
